description: '''Dieter Bohlen''' ({{IPA|de|ˈdiːtɐ ˈboːlən|lang}}; born '''Dieter Günter Bohlen''' on 7 February 1954) is a German songwriter, producer, singer and television personality. He first achieved fame as a member of the pop duo [[Modern Talking]] in the 1980s, and has since produced numerous German and international artists. He is also a judge on casting shows ''[[Deutschland sucht den Superstar]]'' and ''[[Das Supertalent]]''.
